1 Pounds'} Review Text: It cleanses the skin ok but you aren't supposed to use it around your eyes - that's what I bought it for to remove all of the makeup Review Title: Not a fan Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog Review Date: 2020/09/25 Store: JOYYUM Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; I took small sections and tried to add volume, it just wouldn't spin.
I bought a Baby Bliss - and it is amazing! Review Title: I have thick, fine hair. Would not spin Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JOYYUM 1000W 2-in-1 Hot Air Spin Brush Styler Auto-rotating Negative Ionic Hair Curler Dryer Brush, 1 1/2 Inch and 2 Inch Brush Attachments, Lavander Fog Review Date: 2020/09/25 Store: JOYYUM Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JOYYUM', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Comb, Portable, Massage, Hot', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Curling', 'Package Dimensions': '16.3 x 5.4 x 3.2 inches; 1.85 Pounds', 'UPC': '787414814279', 'Manufacturer': 'JOYYUM'} Review Text: Very disappointed in this product - I have a lot of hair but it is fine. I took small sections and tried to add volume, it just wouldn't spin.
I bought a Baby Bliss - and it is amazing! Review Title: I have thick, fine hair. Would not spin Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Volumizing Hair Root Clips Set of 12, Natural Fluffy Hair Clip Self Grip Root Volume Hair Curler Clip, 6 Colors Curly Hair Styling Tool Hair Rollers Small And Easy to Carry Review Date: 2021/02/09 Store: Lahien Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Clip', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Size': '12 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Brand': 'Lahien', 'Package Dimensions': '7.13 x 5.31 x 2.52 inches; 8.47 Ounces'} Review Text: I had such high hopes but no matter how tight and close to the root, it always left my hair crimped. Review Title: Left my hair crimped Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

**Shopping Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Beauty and Skincare**: Strong interest in makeup tools, particularly those designed for application and concealing.
- **Product Variety**: Engagement with various products—including cleansers and styling tools—indicates a focus on both skincare and haircare.
- **Performance Expectations**: Disappointment expressed with certain hair styling devices suggests a preference for high-quality, effective products.
- **Natural Ingredients**: Selections also show a tendency towards products featuring natural components.
- **Frequent Issues**: Repeated themes of dissatisfaction with products that do not perform as advertised (e.g., ineffective makeup removers and styling tools).
- **Rating Trends**: Mixed ratings, with specific products receiving high praise while others receive low scores, demonstrating critical evaluation of products.
- **Review Behavior**: Active reviewer who conveys genuine experiences, indicating a thoughtful purchasing approach. 

Overall, the individual's shopping behavior reveals a discerning consumer seeking effective beauty and haircare solutions, with high expectations for product performance.
